description.narrative: The Global lnitiative to end all Corporal Punishment of Children (GI) är en organisation som verkar för att skydda barn mot aga genom att främja staters antaganden av lagstiftning som förbjuder aga. GI bedriver påverkansarbete och samverkar med FN, civila samhället (NGOs) och stater. Insatsens syfte är att: -Kartlägga och analysera barnagarelaterade frågor och samla annan information för spridning och påverkansarbete med fokus på FN systemet, stater och andra aktörer. -Driva och främja barnagaförbud genom spridning av information och bistå stater och andra aktörer med relevant expert kunskap. -Delta i relevanta fora och bygga partnerskap med individer och organisationer för att driva förbud mot barnaga.

The overall goal of the GI’s work is to see more states enacting legislation to prohibit all corporal punishment of children. This aim is implied but not explicitly stated in the workplan and results framework because the actions of governments/parliaments are not under GI's control. GI claims though that the pursuit of the identified goals and objectives will lead to a continued and accelerating increase in the number of states with full prohibition and others committed to achieving it.
GI will specifically during the coming agreement period: -Maintain and disseminate GI’s global mapping of the legality of corporal punishment and of opportunities for prohibition, information on implementation of prohibition and summaries of relevant research to inform advocacy at international, regional and national levels. -Maintain and increase international and regional human rights pressure on states to prohibit and eliminate corporal punishment. -Promote the drafting of national legislation which achieves prohibition and provide technical advice and support for it. -Ensure maximum use at the national level of the human rights pressure, GI’s mapping of legislation, findings from research and information on implementation of prohibition and GI’s technical expertise in drafting prohibiting legislation to engage key actors in the promotion, achievement and implementation of prohibition of corporal punishment. -Initiate and maintain positive relationships with high-level, influential and/or expert individuals and bodies at global, regional and national levels for strategic lobbying and/or collaboration in the fulfilment of GI's other strategic goals.
